channel.title: Suggestion for the site
channel.description:
Hey just a suggestion but as lots of you probably know python is like 20* easier to program then java and their are python 2 java converters(such as jython) so wouldnt it make sense for us to have a python forum in the programming section. im pretty sure this would aid in the stopping of leechers because of how easy the language is to learn. and we could simply convert any python scripts to java or even implement a python module into aryan (but that would take work )
plz leave your coments on the idea..

item.description:
@jme wrote:

Yeah I actually looked at python for the first time last night, it looks so simplified, anyone could tear apart the code and understand it.
